job_description:
Company: AILabs
Position: Data Scientist
Location: Mountain View, CA (Hybrid)
Salary: $150,000 - $180,000

About Us:
AILabs is a leading artificial intelligence research and development company. We are committed to pushing the boundaries of AI and developing innovative solutions to real-world problems.

Job Description:
We are looking for a Data Scientist to join our team. You will be responsible for developing and deploying machine learning models. The ideal candidate will have experience with Python, scikit-learn, and TensorFlow.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and deploy machine learning models
- Analyze large datasets to identify trends and insights
- Communicate findings to stakeholders
- Collaborate with engineers and product managers

Requirements:
- Master's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, or related field
- 3+ years of experience in data science
- Proficient in Python
- Experience with scikit-learn and TensorFlow

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with PyTorch
- Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)
- Experience with data visualization tools (Tableau, Power BI)

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and benefits package
- Opportunity to work on cutting-edge research
- Collaborative and supportive work environment
